short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summer Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Summer background. Summer season wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle the Summer wallpaper each time you open a new tab.
2. Option to randomize the Summer background or set as a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media accounts for quick access.
5. Displays the current date and time by default.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Simple access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for fast access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Direct link to more themes.
12. Streamlined sharing to social media platforms.
13. One-click download of wallpapers.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Summer new tab.
